evidence_example.small_descr: This is the example presented in Embedded World 2007.
evidence_example.long_descr:
This is the example presented in Embedded World 2007.
A demo including:
  • One task;
  • One periodic alarm controlled by timer T1
  • Support for Evidence Flex
  • Support for ZigBee
  • Support for Compass
  • Support for Ultrasound Sensor
  • Eagle Schematics to build a Flex daughter board
